Experience.description: Developed an NMS Topology System, a robust tool designed for creating a variety of topology diagrams to meet diverse network management needs. The system features a user-friendly interface for designing and customizing diagrams. My responsibilities included developing an intuitive UI for diagram customization, building reusable components, managing state changes, and optimizing the UI to ensure both performance and scalability.

Developed an online shopping app website that utilizes various client-side tools to provide a seamless and engaging user experience. The website features a responsive design, intuitive navigation, and robust search functionality, allowing users to easily find and purchase products. My responsibilities included implementing robust search functionality and filtering options, ensuring seamless navigation and checkout processes, and implementing security measures to protect user data.

ProjectsDisplay.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, experience, and projects.

ProjectsDisplay.description: A fully functional e-commerce platform with a user-friendly interface and secure payment gateway.

ProjectsArchive.description: A simple weather application that fetches data from a public API and displays the current weather for any location.
